```
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: www
  labels:
    app: www
spec:
  initContainers:
  - name: download
    image: axeclbr/git
    command:                       ![1](assets/1.png)
    - git
    - clone
    - https://github.com/mdn/beginner-html-site-scripted
    - /var/lib/data
    volumeMounts:                  ![2](assets/2.png)
    - mountPath: /var/lib/data
      name: source
  containers:
  - name: run
    image: docker.io/centos/httpd
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
    volumeMounts:                  ![2](assets/2.png)
    - mountPath: /var/www/html
      name: source
  volumes:                         ![3](assets/3.png)
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: source
```
